subject: Release 2.77 "Capture the city!"
description:
Main goals:

- Make new vfs container system work
- Make new db based favorites work 
- Adjust main menu to show quick join options
- Implement competition gameplay features based on received feedback
- ... fix as many other bugs as possible

Also:
- Update OB navpoints, WolfAdmin
- Update libs (minor update only)
- Ensure 2.60b client still works without crash (check new favorites system, use #LEGACY macro if needed)

ETA: ASAP
